links.title: Fired Tesla Workers Still Love Elon Musk
links.description: Tesla Inc. just started bidding farewell to more than 3,000 employees, the biggest layoffs in the company's 15-year history. Some of those who lost their jobs have had surprisingly positive parting words to share with the chief executive who let them go.

links.title: $AAPL The Bullish Option Trade After an Earnings Rip in Apple Inc
links.description: If you've ever seen a stop rip off of earnings and wondered if that was a signal for a trade, or if the momentum would continue, then this is exactly the back-test you are after. We call it "star gazing" when a stock rips and we're stuck -- with no idea what to expect next.

links.title: Apple Tests Feature That Could Hamper Investigators' Access to iPhones
links.description: Apple is working on a new security feature that could make it harder for investigators to retrieve data from iPhones, the latest twist in its long-running standoff with law-enforcement agencies over user privacy.

links.title: Here's the new AT&T
links.description: A federal judge on Tuesday gave the green light for AT&T's Time Warner acquisition to proceed, ushering in a media, technology and telecommunications behemoth. Related: AT&T wins big. Next up: Comcast and Fox The combined company posted nearly $192 billion in sales last year, and is worth roughly $282 billion on the stock market.
